resources.string:
The aim of the game is to answer correctly a series of questions related to France history and the contemporary world, with variable difficulties (easy, medium, difficult), to obtain the best score and improve your record. 

The game has a limited duration. 

You receive at the beginning of the Quiz a number of units. 

Each correct answer increases your score by a number that depends on the difficulty of the question and adds that same number to your number of units. On the other hand, if the answer is incorrect, this number is subtracted from your number of units. 

You also have the ability to skip a predetermined number of questions and there is a voice synthesis option that you can activate or not. 

The Quiz ends at the end of the allotted time or when you have no more units.
Welcome to History Questions \n\nBe the fastest to get the best score and improve your record

Good! You can download 
mon "Histoire de France"

 http://aperrault.atspace.cc
 Access code: Machupichu
History Questions is a Quiz for smartphone and tablet Android. With its thousand questions about history of France and contemporary world, this free game will entertain you for many hours
